Key Match Events: Son Heung-Min scored twice and set up the third goal for South Korea
Son Heung-Min scored the second goal in the final minute of the first half with a header
Son Heung-Min provided the assist for the third goal three minutes from time
Miscellaneous Highlights: China's first defeat after winning against Thailand on Thursday
Australia's Harry Souttar scored the only goal in their 1-0 win over Palestine
United Arab Emirates won 2-0 against Bahrain
